Field Detail

server

public final Server server
The Server instance this SCP is using.

Method Detail

setApplicationTitles

public void setApplicationTitles(String[] calling,
                                 String[] called)
These SCP will only handle messages from associations using calling and called Application Entitities (AE) titles listed in the specified arrays. Passing a null array means that any AE will be accepted. By default, every called and calling AE are accepted. Must be called before the SCP is started.

setApplicationTitles

public void setApplicationTitles(String calling,
                                 String called)
Convenient replacement for setApplicationTitles(String[], String[]) when using single titles. Passing a null String meants that any AE will be accepted.
